ReleaseNote:
- Included AfxHookSource2 0.32.1 (2025-04-29T13:15Z)
- Fixed HLAE Setup upgrade uninstalls HLAE due to wrong HlaeCore version number.

## AfxHookSource2 0.32.1 (2025-04-29T13:15)
- Updated depth stream defaults.
- Fixed smoke depth composition bugs.
- Fixed mirv_streams captureType depth24 / depthF not working (OpenEXR).
- Fixed crashes with ReShade (6.4.1).

When using ReShade, then ReShade 6.4.1 and ReShade_advancedfx.addon 1.4.1 are tested with and recommended for this version.

# Includes (HLAE 2.182.0 (2025-04-27T15:10Z) pre-release

- Included AfxHookSource2 0.32.0 (2025-04-27T15:10Z).

## AfxHookSource2 0.32.0 (2025-04-27T15:10Z)
- Added fake `mirv_streams`, so you can capture depth and e.g. colors before Panorama UI at same time. Adds `mirv_streams add`, `mirv_streams edit`, `mirv_streams print`, `mirv_streams remove`. Each stream has a number of options that we will try to describe in the Manual / Wiki with a few examples.
- Added better depth for ReShade and mirv_streams.
- Added (optional, default on) smoke depth compositing for mirv_streams and ReShade. For this to work well a smoke full-res pass is forced in default settings when using ReShade or when recording a stream with depth.

Thanks to Rikki 'eirisocherry' for input and helping with testing in the early stages.
